Purpose: To ensure accurate, precise, and reliable measurement of total iron binding capacity in serum samples.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST, gold or tiger-top) or red-top tube without anticoagulant
Equipment: Automated chemistry analyzer capable of TIBC assays (e.g., Beckman Coulter AU5800, Roche Cobas 6000), centrifuge, calibrated pipettes, refrigerator and freezer
